channel.title: Online Learning on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Online Learning on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Online Classification with Predictions
item.description: Online learning algorithms can now leverage predictions about future data to achieve significantly lower regret, smoothly transitioning between worst-case and best-case performance based on prediction…

item.title: Online Learning with Sublinear Best-Action Queries
item.description: Boost online learning algorithms with sublinear best-action queries to achieve optimal regret!
